name: MuseHome
description:
MuseHome brings the museum experience directly to your home using Oculus Quest.

Using procedurally generated rooms, you can explore a full-size museum even if you only have a small space available. 

No walkthrough is ever going to be the same, every room you see is generated for the first time in front of your eyes.

Interact with every single artwork, walk into rooms filled with masterpieces, and learn about the artist and his work.

Get personal with the artwork by zooming, rotating and checking out every single detail and then get back to the MuseHome experience with the click of a button.

To appreciate the exploring experience a Oculus Quest is needed.

This project was realized for the Virtual Reality Course at Politecnico di Torino a.a. 2020

Developers:

Lorenzo Cannillo

Lorenzo Cardone

Giorgio Da Vià

Alessandro Tripodi
